main.description: A project that can include multiple activities, each of which may be linked to at most one project.

shortDescription.description: Short summary of this project, suitable for previews and list views.

description.description: Rich-text description of this project, represented as a Leaflet linear document.

avatar.description: Primary avatar image representing this project across apps and views; typically a square logo or project identity image.

coverPhoto.description: The cover photo of this project (either in URI format or in a blob).

activities.description: Array of activities with their associated weights in this project

location.description: A strong reference to a location record describing where the work for this project took place. The referenced record must conform to the app.certified.location lexicon.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
